entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
